stable.change_log:
BravePipe Release 0.27.6-2.3.6

New features available on ('BravePipe Settings' settings page)
- BravePipe: Feature add internal volume control
- BravePipe(Extractor): RUMBLE: setting and methods to hide premium content
- BravePipe(Extractor): YOUTUBE: add setting to hide youtube 'members only' streams

Misc:
- moved search ui selection into 'BravePipe Settings' page

Fixes/Improvments
- BravePipeExtractor: RUMBLE: show (dis)like's of a stream
- BravePipeExtractor: RUMBLE: fix channel search extraction
